Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Approximately 5 minutes to the MA border

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: With convenient access in all directions, 165 Ledge Street is an ideal location for employees who live in  New Hampshire and northern Massachusetts. The property is less than a mile from Exit 5A off the F.E. Everett Turnpike (Route 3), approximately five miles from the Massachusetts border and less than 15 minutes to  Interstate 495.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 165 Ledge Street is a ±107,400 SF well-maintained flex building situated on seven acres of land in the NH/MA Route 3 corridor. Renovated in 2020, the property has become one of Greater Nashua’s finest industrial/ flex facilities. This fully air-conditioned building offers flexible floor plans with ±15,000-35,916 SF of flex space available for lease on the upper level.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
The property is located just minutes from Interstates 293 & 93 and
Route 101E, making for quick access to points north, south, east
and west.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
48 Brook Street, Manchester, NH is an attractive multi-tenant,
mixed-use building consists of office, retail and residential
space.48 Brook Street, Manchester, NH. This attractive multi-tenant,
mixed-use building consists of office, retail and residential space. The space is comprised of the following: Fully operational hair salon, office tenants and residential apartment.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: ±2,135 SF of office space on the 1st floor
Within minutes of Exit 7 & 8 of the Everett Turnpike

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 23 Dumaine Avenue is located directly off Route 101A/Amherst Street and is less than 3.5 miles from the F.E. Everett Turnpike, with access from Exits 7 or 8. The Manchester-Boston Regional Airport and Massachusetts border are both within a 20-minute drive.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE is pleased to present the availability of 23 Dumaine Avenue in Nashua, New Hampshire for lease. This industrial/flex building has ±2,135 SF of office space available on the 1st floor. The building is serviced by municipal utilities. Zoned Park Industrial, 23 Dumaine Avenue sits on 3.80 acres and offers 112 parking spaces.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 17 Colby Court is located directly off South River Road in Bedford’s major business corridor zoned Performance, with a traffic count of over 17,000 VPD. Nearby amenities include restaurants, hotels, retail shops, fitness and financial services. The location of the property offers quick and easy access to Interstates 293, 93, F.E. Everett Turnpike and Route 101. The Manchester-Boston Regional Airport is only minutes away.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE is pleased to present the availability of 17 Colby Court, Bedford, NH for lease. Formerly the home of Walmart, this ±123,400 SF facility is an industrial repositioning of a retail property. Ideal for warehouse distribution, the building is divisible to 50,000 SF. The space features 18-22’ clear height, 30 ’x 40’ column spacing, 480-277v/3 phase-2,000 amps of power, energy efficient lighting, one drive-in door and two loading docks (expandable), with parking for 556 vehicles. The building is situated on 12.2 acres. There is the possibility of fenced-in/secured outside storage.
